articles.title: Italy's Giorgia Meloni says no place for Islam in Europe: 'There is a problem of compatibility' | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Her comments arrived after she hosted a political festival organised by her far-right party – the Brothers of Italy – in Rome which was attended by British prime minister Rishi Sunak.
